however, [http://johnboehner.house.gov/Biography/ Boehner's biography at
House.gov] recommends the pronunciation .}}; born , 1949) is the 61st and
current Speaker of the United States House of Representatives. A
member of the Republican Party, he is the U.S. Representative from , serving
since 1991. The district includes several rural and suburban areas near
Cincinnati and Dayton.

Boehner previously served as the House Minority Leader from 2007 until 2011, and
House Majority Leader from 2006 until 2007. As Speaker of the House, Boehner is
second in line to the presidency of the United States following the Vice
President in accordance with the Presidential Succession Act.
